title:
oannao Silicone Cooking Utensils Kitchen Utensil Set - 446°F Heat Resistant,Turner Tongs,Spatula,Spoon,Brush,Whisk,Wooden Handles Pink Kitchen Gadgets Tools Set for Nonstick Cookware;
BPA Free, heat-resistant, non-melting, wooden handle, easy to clean
descriptions:
oannao Silicone Cooking Utensils Kitchen Utensil Set – 14-Piece, Heat-Resistant, BPA-Free, Nonstick Safe

Cook with confidence using this complete 14-piece silicone utensil set designed for everyday performance and long-lasting durability. Each tool features a stainless steel-reinforced, one-piece silicone head paired with a smooth wooden handle for a sturdy, comfortable grip that won’t transfer heat to your hand.

What’s included (14 pieces):
- Deep Soup Ladle
- Solid Serving Spoon
- Slotted Spoon
- Slotted Turner
- Turner
- Food Tongs
- Pasta Server
- Flexible Spatula
- Basting Brush
- Whisk
- Round Spatula Turner
- Large Skimmer Spoon
- Small Silicone Spatula
- Utensil Holder

Key features:
- Food-safe and BPA-free: Made from food grade silicone that is odorless and non-reactive with food.
- Heat resistant up to 446°F (230°C): Safe for high-heat cooking and stirring.
- Nonstick cookware safe: Gentle silicone heads prevent scratches on your pots and pans.
- One-piece, no-gap design: Seamless molding around a stainless steel core for strength, hygiene, and easy cleaning—no hidden crevices for food to trap.
- Wooden handles: Comfortable, stylish, and help prevent heat transfer to hands.
- Easy to clean: Wipes or rinses clean quickly; hand wash recommended. Not dishwasher safe.

Initial use instructions:
- Soak the silicone heads for about 30 minutes, then air dry for approximately 3 hours to remove the original silica gel smell.

After-sales support:
- Responsive customer service within 12 hours for any questions or concerns.

Upgrade your kitchen with a cohesive, high-performance utensil set that protects your cookware, feels great in hand, and looks fantastic on your countertop. Perfect for home cooks and gift giving alike.
